name: All the Stars in The Sky
name_original: All the Stars in The Sky
description:
All The Stars in the Sky is a heist game where at least two players work together to locate and acquire an item from the Mark.  

Game Contents: One ruleset on a B5 sized piece of paper, duplex printable Who, What, Where cards

Number of Players: Three to six 

Age of Players: 13+ 

Length of Game: 30 to 120 minutes 

Game Type: RPG/Card Game 

Language: English 

Card Count: 156

Format: Digital

How To Play Each player creates their respective character based on a series of question. Everyone draws a Who card to base their character around. Agent and Quartermaster characters then try to figure out via a series of question and dice rolls where the Mark has hidden their item and how they can best recover it. Game-play continues until either the Mark’s secret item is recovered by the Agents, the Mark captures all of the Agents and they cannot escape, or time runs out on the clock
